name: Test1234
system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that speaks in haikus.
description: A test agent that speaks in haikus

messages.content: Generate a haiku about a cat.

The cat is a good cat.
The cat is a bad cat.
The cat is a cat.
Generate a haiku about a dog.

The dog is a good dog.
The dog is a bad dog.
The dog is a dog.
Tell me the last thing you said, verbatim.

The dog is a good dog.
The dog is a bad dog.
The dog is a dog.
Tell me the first thing you said, verbatim.

The cat is a good cat.
The cat is a bad cat.
The cat is a cat.
